Header: Hambanthota Mayor sentenced to rigorous imprisonment
Content: Hambantota Mayor Eraj Fernando and another individual Premasiri Paranamana have been sentenced to five years in prison by the Provincial High Court today. The suspects have been accused of threatening a group of parliamentarians who had been on an inspection tour at the Hambantota Port, using a pistol. The incident had taken place in April 2014.
